title: thambulava koLLu
sahitya:
tAmbUlava koLLu tamana mardananE kamalavadananE



(tAmbUlava)







anupallavi







ambujAkSi modadi madacikoDudALE sampigeNNe attaru



candaneNNe Ipari parividha parimaLada enNNe 



(tAmbUlava)







caraNam







mauktikada suNNa karpUra berasi tA rukmiNi dEviyu samarpisutALE



mancava hAkkidE mallige huva tarisidE munce bandu malagayya



mincutali



cancalAkShiyu  ninna eduru nOdudALE pancabANanayya shrI



purandara viThalA 



(tAmbUlava)
